user_instruction: 'Tell John to reply to me (emily.harris@greenleafwellness.org) with guidance on handling anxiety disorders, and remind him to check his Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Guidance on Anxiety Disorder Cases

Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well. Could you please reply to me at emily.harris@greenleafwellness.org with your guidance on handling anxiety disorders? Your insights are always incredibly helpful as I work through some new cases.

Also, when you have a moment, please check your Notion workspace—you may have relevant information or notes there that could be useful.

Thank you so much for your support!

Warm regards,
Emily

final_output:
